title: Why play bard when you can play nami?
body:
{{champion:267}} is pretty much better in every aspect.
More reliable cc: check
More healing: check
More damage: check
Easier to play: check
No possibility of screwing up your team: check
More pretty: check
Better personality and voice: check

The only reason I can think of you playing bard is if you want to troll your team.
